item.title: Network Codec API Reference
item.description: Network Codec A Network Codec has two interfaces: a Codec Interface which is used to encode/decode message from a Model/Device (connected to a Network), and a Stream Interface which is used to exchange the encoded messages with other Model/Devices connected to the same Network. The Network Codec API (codec.h & codec.c) provides the framework for implementing both the Codec Interface and the Stream Interface. A typical realisation of this scheme would be:
